register.heading: Registration in TeaStream
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
register.usernameDescription: Other users will know you by this name.
register.emailDescription: We may use your email to send messages regarding your account.
register.passwordDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
register.successAlertDescription: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address. If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.

login.heading: Log in to TeaStream
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app.
login.loginDescription: The name or email you entered during registration.
login.passwordDescription: The password you entered during registration.

resetPassword.heading: Reset Password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email address you entered during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have Telegram notifications enabled, the link has also been sent there

newPassword.heading: New Password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you entered during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation
